name: TetroFighter
description:
Are you and a copilot ready to take on the Tetrada Armada? To qualify:

  • Pilot is required to have quick reflexes and a hunger to destroy the enemy!
  • Copilot must be a fast thinker and puzzler to make your ship the best it can be!

In TetroFighter, you work together to defeat the enemy, collect their debris, and use their technology against them to win the war! By arranging the debris on-the-fly, you'll be able to power-up your ship to take on the constant onslaught of whatever the Armada may throw at you and your partner.

Be sure to take a screenshot of your final score and post to the comments to show off your skills in TetroFighter!
